title: Hamed Zamani
text:
Hamed Zamani () is an Iranian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">Defender</a> who currently plays for Iranian football club <a href="Rah%20Ahan">Rah Ahan</a> in the <a href="Iran%20Pro%20League">Iran Pro League</a>.
Club career.
In summer of 2013, he joined <a href="Rah%20Ahan">Rah Ahan</a>. In 2014, he was suspended and arrested because of his conscription problems. He joined to <a href="Niroye%20Zamini%20F.C.">Niroye Zamini</a> to spend his conscription period. In winter 2015 he rejoined <a href="Rah%20Ahan">Rah Ahan</a>.
